description: Combine fire and metal to craft weapons and armor from ore, metals, and other materials.
Carve wood into weapons such as staves, bows, and arrows, as well as shields and decorative items for the guild hall.
Bend metal and gemstones into sparkly jewelry with powerful stat bonuses.
Turn cloth and leather into useful items, such as robes, vests, and padding for plate armor made by blacksmiths.

Chronomancers extract an item's essence and capture Chrono Dust, destroying the item in the process. Chrono Dust is combined to craft Chrono, which is used to manipulate time itself in the game world. Higher level Chronomancers collect more Dust and produce Chrono faster.
Combine raw ingredients into delicious snacks and meals!
Catch fresh fish (and other treasures) from rivers, lakes, and oceans.
Find berries, leaves, and other valuable resources in natural environments.
Carefully pick valuable gems, metals, and minerals from less valuable rocks.
Craft tasty beverages - there's something for everyone!
